title: Innovaccer | SDE-1 | Noida
content:
Education: Btech from IIT
Years of Experience: 1.2 YOE + 1 Year as intern in diifferent companies 
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at an service based company(remote)
Current TC - 20LPA (Just got hike of 20% after recieving the offer - 24LPA from next month)
Date of the Offer: 19 Jul 2024

Company: Innovaccer
Title/Level: SDE-1 
Location:Noida
Salary:24 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: No money, tikcets and 15 day of stay
Stock bonus: 0 
Bonus: Not sure, was not mentioned in offer letter
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 24 LPA
Benefits: Health insurance and other standard benifits 
Other details: Accepted the offer as my current org is not toxic but work is pretty basic and there is nothing new to learn for a long time. I hope I took the right decision.
yoe: 1.2 Yoe + 1 Year As Intern In Diifferent Companies

title: Software Engineer - 1 | Need help with offers.
content:
Hi community.

Got 2 offers and need help in deciding which one I should choose?

Education: B.E in Computer Science
Years of Experience: ~2
Prior Experience: SDE-1 in mid-sized company
Date of the Offers: July 2024
Current compensation : 13.6 LPA (12.4 fixed)

**Offer 1**

Company: Jenkins CI/CD.
Title/Level: Software Dev. I
Location: Bengaluru 
Salary: 17.5LPA INR (All fixed)

Total comp: 17.5LPA

Tech : Java

I feel growth prospects are more here due to great tech and great product.

**Offer 2**

Company:Avalara
Title/Level: Software Dev. I
Location: Pune 
Salary: 20 L(Fixed) + 1.5L(JB) + 1L(PLI) + 50k(Benefits)

Total comp: 23LPA

Tech: Not sure but most likely (C# .NET)

Very inclined on joining the first company due to great interaction with the team and clarity on the role.(Also the tech-stack is great)
However difference in compensation is quite significant.

Need clarity about Avalara and growth opportunites there (team and work seems fine).
Also tech stack at avalara is not that great.

PS: tried to negotiate with the first company , recruiter did not budge(claimed they have maxed out their budget).

Thank you!!.

title: Microsoft | L62 | India
content:
Education: NIT (equivalent)
Years of Experience: 6
Prior Experience: Apple
Date of the Offer: Jul 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L62
Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad
Salary: 39L
Signing Bonus: 8L (4+4)
Stock bonus: $125,000 (26L)
Bonus: ~10%, 3.9L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 39L + 26L + 3.9L + 4L = 73L
Benefits: Standard
Other details: N.A.

title: Microsoft | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: CSE in Computer Science from NIT Andhra Pradesh
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: Software Engineer at Starup
Current CTC: 21 LPA INR + no stocks

Date of the Offer: July 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Software Engineer II Full stack
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 30 LPA INR (fixed)
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 40K USD stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of base salary
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 43LPA for first year
Benefits: 30k INR to spend on sports stuff or gym  +  covered health/dental/vision insurance + other benifits

Note: Don't have any other counter offers in hand.

I will be sharing interview experience soon.
Am I being low-balled for SDE II?

content:

Signing Bonus:  6 Lacs -  claw-back of 2 years

title: Microsoft L61 [India]
content:
Years of Experience: ~4 years
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L61
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: Base salary 31LPA
Stock bonus: 70K USD spread across 4 years
Performance Bonus: 6.2 L [upto 20% of base]
Jonining/relocation bonus: ~7L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 31 + 6.2 + 14.6 +7 = 58.8 LPA for the first year
Benefits: Regular microsoft benefits.

Prev comp: Base 33LPA fixed, ESOP worth 8L

title: Hashedin By Deloitte | Software Engineer 3 | Pune | June 2024 | Offer | Compensation
content:
Education: Engineering CSE 2020 batch passout
Years of Experience: 4 years in Service based company
Current Fixed: 9.4 LPA (excluding my pf part)
Overall CTC: 10.5 LPA (including pf my and company, variable, and other misc)
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Hashedin By Deloitte
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Pune
Salary: 15 LPA Fixed
Variable: 1.5 LPA
Joining Bonus: 1 LPA
Total CTC: 17.5 LPA

Is this offer good? or am I getting lowballed?
